ygData.subject: Re: can anyone...
ygData.msgSnippet: There is no tone in your voice my friend, BUT there is a tone in your words, if you do not type them correctly, people will take them wrong, I am not being
ygData.messageBody:
There is no tone in your voice my friend, BUT
there is a tone in your words, if you do not type them
correctly, people will take them wrong, I am not being nosy
by stepping in and commenting thankyou, I am
stepping in to give the assistance that was asked, My only
reason for saying there was no need to be rude was for
the lack of any other word possible and mainly
directed towards "jackass" although now, I'm not quite
sure who's side I am on, because your words of "nosy"
is offensive we are all here to help each other and
with you telling me that I am nosy, it sounds like you
are saying that we are not here to help
everyone...<br>Myystical
